# Patrick Finnerty

Ph.D. student in Electrical Engineering at the University of New Mexico researching radiation-induced effects in wide bandgap optoelectronics. I work across III-V MOCVD growth, device design/fabrication, and electro-optical characterization, and when it's applicable, I use Python-based automation across these areas. 

I like salsa/bachata dancing and long walks with my dog!!
